mapinfo.detailsText:
You are located high up on the Tibetan Plateau, dangerously close to your opponent. If you don't venture out of your base you will be soon out of resources. 
 Take advantage of the long downstream trade routes and capture the numerous wild yaks for a long term stock of food.
 
 Native Civs: Udasi / Shaolin 
 Mercenaries: Marathan Dacoit / Wokou Horseman 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
